full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGRUB PA'I THABS BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS, ,@009B BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI, ,LUNG RTOGS KYI MDZES LHA'I BTZUN PA, ,TSUL KHRIMS THO YON ZHES BYAS SNGA MO NAS, ,NAN GYIS BSKUL KYANG DAL 'BYOR STONG ZANG LA, ,GZHAN DON MING BTAGS RNAM GA-YENG NGANG LUS PA, ,DRANG ZHING BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS ZHES BYA BAS, ,SBYAR BA'I DGE BA'I BDAG DANG 'GRO BA KUN, ,DENG NAS BYANG CHUB SNYING PO MA THOB PAR, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO NYER DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,'DI YI CHOS TSUL TSUL BZHIN NYAMS BLANGS TE, ,@010A *, ,TSE GCIG NYID LA SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU BYON, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
